question.para: Glibc fails with ". . . . it is normal to compile GNU libc with the `linuxthreads' add-on. . . ."

answer.para: The exact error looks like this: *** On GNU/Linux systems it is normal to compile GNU libc with the *** `linuxthreads' add-on. Without that, the library will be *** incompatible with normal GNU/Linux systems. *** If you really mean to not use this add-on, run configure again *** using the extra parameter `--disable-sanity-checks'.
You have not unpacked glibc-linuxthreads-X.X.X.tar.bz2 in the glibc-X.X.X directory. Unpack it there and you'll be all set.
